emuInput.TitMainTitle: Thelma Jefferies and Jessie Vann shaking hands, standing on stage in front of open refrigerator, in Ammon Center for the 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Grand Prize - Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president and publisher of the Courier, heartily congratulates Mrs. Thelma Jefferies, 633 Ossipee Street, grand-prize winner of a special Crosley Shelvador Refrigerator."
